categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Colonel Jeffers was Imperial General Irrv's aide on Culroon III. He was killed by Kloff, the leader of the local natives, during a trap set by the local populace.

Colonel Jeffers was a male military officer serving the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War. He was assigned as General Irrv's aide, and was present with the general on the backwater planet Culroon III. Irrv had been tasked by Emperor Palpatine with subjugating the planet, and had convinced the local warlord, Kloff, to take part in a ceremonial exchange of weapons to signify the Culroon's acceptance of Imperial rule. During the ceremony, Irrv passed a Naval sword to Kloff, who then promptly used the weapon to kill Colonel Jeffers and launch an ambush on the assembled Imperial soldiers. The Culroon were subsequently routed by the arrival of Lieutenant Maximilian Veers and his All Terrain Armored Transport.
